normalised: ## Automotive: New Traffic Regulations Aim to Reduce Road Accidents

unnormalised: The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways has announced revised traffic regulations effective October 26th, 2024, designed to enhance road safety and streamline traffic flow across India. These regulations, impacting both private and commercial vehicles, emphasize stricter enforcement of existing rules and introduce several new provisions.

unnormalised: The regulations also mandate stricter compliance with speed limits on highways, with radar speed guns being deployed more frequently.
